LanguageData.AAVPE_HeraldOfTheBlackHive.label: Insect Summoner
LanguageData.AAVPE_HeraldOfTheBlackHive.description: An insectoid cultist that uses magic to manipulate insects.
LanguageData.AAVPE_HeraldOfTheBlackHive.tooltip: Insect Summoner focus on using magic to control the suspectible minds of insects to do the casters bidding, usually driving them towards their enemies.
LanguageData.AAVPE_Oculist.label: Warlock
LanguageData.AAVPE_Oculist.description: A warlock is a mage that has formed a pact with an eldritch entity.
LanguageData.AAVPE_Oculist.tooltip: By offering their soul to an eldritch being, Warlocks gain significant dark magic powers, but are viewed as grotesque abominations. They can summon eldrtich beings from beyond the spheres of normality.
LanguageData.AAVPE_Xenoseer.label: Shaman
LanguageData.AAVPE_Xenoseer.description: Shaman are studious experts of natural life.
LanguageData.AAVPE_Xenoseer.tooltip: Shaman dedicate themselves to the study and understanding of creatures, and emulating their unique abilities. Shaman can imbue their body with a range of naturally occuring defence powers.
LanguageData.AAVPE_Ravager.label: Primal
LanguageData.AAVPE_Ravager.description: Primals are powerful fighters who use animalistic abilities to defeat their enemies.
LanguageData.AAVPE_Ravager.tooltip: Primal mages can empower themselves with animalistic aspects and tap into more primitive combat styles, when channeling a powerful animal primals can defeat their enemies in a single rage-fueled blow.
